    A SpacingHandler complemented by fluent setters.
    See Also:
    SpacingHandler

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default THIS withSpacing(boolean enabled)
      Enable spacing between child components within this layout.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.vaadin.ui.Layout.SpacingHandler

        isSpacing, setSpacing

    • Method Detail

      • withSpacing

        default THIS withSpacing(boolean enabled)
        Enable spacing between child components within this layout.

        NOTE: This will only affect the space between components, not the space around all the components in the layout (i.e. do not confuse this with the cellspacing attribute of a HTML Table). Use MarginHandler#setMargin(boolean) to add space around the layout.

        See the reference manual for more information about CSS rules for defining the amount of spacing to use.

        Parameters:
        enabled - true if spacing should be turned on, false if it should be turned off
        Returns:
        this (for method chaining)
        See Also:
        Layout.SpacingHandler.setSpacing(boolean)
